page.title: 02PRINCIPAL FEATURES (2)
page.content: {HOUSING { }The area consists of a mixture of different types of dwellings. { {FLATS} There are no high rise flats. There are still some maisonettes and there used to be some large family houses. Serious mistakes were made when these were first built and they are now being knocked down or altered. {BUNGALOWS }New bungalows are being built in Speke for Senior Citizens and Disabled persons. When they altered the large family houses which had three storeys they made some of them into two storey houses and many of them into attractive bungalows {FARMHOUSES }There are still a few farmhouses on the Hale side of our area. Some of them are still used as farmhouses whilst others have been converted into cottages.
